author: AnKushSingh05
body:
### GitHubTags
#A11ySev2; #A11yTCS;#DesktopWeb; #Win32;#.NET Project system for CSharp and VB;#BM_AspireDashboard_Web_June25;#Win32;#WCAG4.1.2:#Name Role Value;#A11yMAS;

### Environment Details:
Application Name: Aspire Dashboard
Edition Windows 11 Enterprise
Version 24H2
OS build 26100.4351

### Repro Steps

1. Open Visual studio.
2. Open a aspire project and run it.
3. A new window will open in the chromium edge,
4. TAB to "Github copilot chat" tab item and hit ENTER key.
5. Verify that Incorrect name property is provided for "Model Selector" button as Claude sonnet 4.

### Actual Result:
Incorrect name property is provided for "Model Selector" button as Claude sonnet 4

### Expected Result:
Correct name property as Model Selector should be provided.

### User Impact:
Screen reader users will get confused if correct name property is not provided and they will not know the purpose of the control.

### Attachment:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a02dccc5-f070-41a0-a2f7-36de61d4085d)
title: Incorrect name property is provided for "Model Selector" button as Claude sonnet 4: A11y_Aspire Dashboard_Metrics_Name.

author: AnKushSingh05
body:
### GitHubTags
#A11ySev1; #A11yTCS;#DesktopWeb; #Win32;#.NET Project system for CSharp and VB;#BM_AspireDashboard_Web_June25;#Win32;#WCAG2.1.1;#Keyboard;#A11yMAS;

### Environment Details:
Application Name: Aspire Dashboard
Edition Windows 11 Enterprise
Version 24H2
OS build 26100.4351
Microsoft Visual Studio Enterprise 18 (64-bit) - Int Preview
Version 18.0.0 Preview 1.0 [10807.200.main]

### Repro Steps:

1. Open Visual studio.
2. Open a aspire project and run it.
3. A new window will open in the chromium edge, TAB to "Copilot" tab item and hit ENTER key.
4. Verify that Model selector options are not accessible using the keyboard.

### Actual Result:
Model selector options are not accessible using the keyboard.

### Expected Result:
Model selector options should be accessible using the keyboard keys and user can select them.

### User Impact:
Model selector options are not accessible using the keyboard, making it difficult for keyboard and screen reader users to select the different options available.

### Attachment:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/80fcfd25-90dd-415f-acd6-7fbadbc7827b

nodes.author: adamint
nodes.body:
This will likely have to slip to the next version, as multiple changes are required across fluentui-blazor and here.

1. I filed https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-blazor/pull/4093, which allows us to replace our `AspireMenuButton` components with a more accessible `FluentMenuButton` one. We cannot currently do this because of the inflexibility in button content. So we will need to consume a new fluentui-blazor version.
2. We have to replace AspireMenuButton in this repo.

nodes.author: adamint
nodes.body:
Moving to backlog, as we will not consume a new fluentui release before 9.5 dev ends. We need to make sure to include this in planning for next sprint

cc @maddymontaquila

title: Model selector options are not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_Aspire Dashboard_Copilot_Keyboard

author: AnKushSingh05
body:
### GitHubTags
#A11yTCS;#DesktopWeb; #Win32;#Win32;;#Functionality;#A11yFunctional;#Aspire;

### Environment Details:
Application Name: Aspire Dashboard
Edition Windows 11 Enterprise
Version 24H2
OS build 26100.4351
Microsoft Visual Studio Enterprise 18 (64-bit) - Int Preview
Version 18.0.0 Preview 1.0 [10807.200.main]

### Repro Steps:

1. Open Visual studio.
2. Open a aspire project and run it.
3. A new window will open in the chromium edge, TAB to "Copilot" tab item and hit ENTER key.
4. Verify that Clicking the 'Unhelpful' button auto-selects the 'helpful' button.

### Actual Result:
Clicking the 'Unhelpful' button auto-selects the 'helpful' button

### Expected Result:
When a user clicks on "unhelpful" button, No other reaction (including "helpful") should be automatically selected.

### User Impact:
This may lead to confusion or frustration for users, particularly during feedback or review workflows.

### Attachment:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f96c9d28-8ec8-48ce-8dcb-bf172c663322
title: Clicking the 'Unhelpful' button auto-selects the 'helpful' button: A11y_Aspire Dashboard_Copilot_Functionality
